headline: ExxonMobil's Permian Push: Here's What Investors Should Know
summary: XOM continues ramping up Permian production, leveraging new technology, and plans further output increases in the coming years.

headline: How Recent Analyst Shifts Are Rewriting The Story For Chevron (CVX)
summary: The fair value estimate for Chevron has moved from US$174.83 to US$181.67 per share, supported by an updated revenue growth assumption of about 1.90% compared with 0.49% previously, while the discount rate remains effectively unchanged at 6.956%. This shift mirrors what you are seeing across recent Street research, where some analysts are responding to company updates and cash flow outlooks with higher price targets, while others pull back targets as they lean on more cautious commodity...

headline: Can FuelCell Energy Improve ROI at Fossil Power Plants?
summary: FCEL pitches carbon capture that adds power, cuts compliance costs, and extends coal and gas plant life with modular, scalable systems.

headline: Shell Q4 Earnings Miss as Lower Oil Prices Pressure Results
summary: SHEL's Q4 earnings fell short as lower oil prices and tax impacts weighed on results, even as production rose and buybacks continued.

raw.headline: Shell Q4 Earnings Miss as Lower Oil Prices Pressure Results

headline: Trump Is Remaking the Global Oil Market, and Exxon and Chevron Want In
summary: Venezuela, home to the world’s largest reserves, is the most high-profile opening of a nation that had been mostly off-limits to US investors after Trump captured former leader Nicolas Maduro and took control of the country’s crude exports.

raw.headline: Trump Is Remaking the Global Oil Market, and Exxon and Chevron Want In
raw.summary: Venezuela, home to the world’s largest reserves, is the most high-profile opening of a nation that had been mostly off-limits to US investors after Trump captured former leader Nicolas Maduro and took control of the country’s crude exports.

headline: Shell Pumps Out Dividend Hike Despite Slippery Oil Prices
summary: UK oil major Shell posted its weakest quarterly profit in nearly half a decade on Thursday, sending its New York-listed shares down 5.3%.

raw.headline: Shell Pumps Out Dividend Hike Despite Slippery Oil Prices
